triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: The verification of multi-agent systems is the core problem being addressed by VITAMIN.

triples.name: Model checking
triples.relevance: Model checking is the primary verification technique employed by VITAMIN.

triples.name: Formal verification
triples.relevance: Formal verification is the foundational methodology that VITAMIN is designed to implement for multi-agent systems.

triples.name: Mathematical logic
triples.relevance: Mathematical logic is used in VITAMIN for specifying properties to verify in multi-agent systems.

triples.name: Modular design
triples.relevance: VITAMIN proposes a modular and composable framework design for model checking that enables easy extension to various logics and models.
